abstract.t: This document specifies the requirements necessary to manage the elements and networks that support an MPLS Transport Profile (MPLS-TP). This document is a product of a joint International Telecommunications Union - Telecommunications Standardization Sector (ITU-T) and Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) effort to include a MPLS Transport Profile within the IETF MPLS architecture. The requirements are driven by the management functionality needs defined by ITU-T for packet transport networks. Gray, et al Expires August, 2009 [page 1] Internet-Draft MPLS-TP NM Requirements February, 2009
